```{=html}
<style>
  /* --- BACKGROUND & LAYOUT --- */
  body {
    margin: 0; padding: 0; overflow: hidden;
    background: linear-gradient(180deg, 
        #6b5b95 0%, #c88ea7 40%, #eeb696 70%, #2d3a46 70%, #243038 100%
    );
    height: 100vh;
    font-family: 'Courier New', monospace;
  }

  #splash-screen {
    width: 100vw; height: 100vh;
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
    align-items: center;
  }

  .content-wrapper {
    position: relative; /* This allows us to layer things on top */
    text-align: center;
    width: 500px; /* Must match the image width roughly */
  }

  /* --- THE IMAGE --- */
  .laptop-img {
    width: 100%;
    image-rendering: pixelated; 
    display: block;
  }

  /* --- THE SCREEN OVERLAY --- */
  .monitor-screen {
    position: absolute;
    top: 35%;  /* MOVES BUTTONS UP/DOWN */
    left: 0;
    width: 100%;
    text-align: center;
    z-index: 10;
  }

  /* --- THE TEXT & BUTTONS --- */
  .terminal-text {
    color: #50fa7b; /* Retro Green */
    font-size: 14px;
    margin-bottom: 10px;
    text-shadow: 1px 1px 0 #000;
  }

  .pixel-btn {
    display: block;
    width: 120px;
    margin: 5px auto; /* Centers the buttons */
    padding: 5px 0;
    
    background-color: #282a36; /* Dark background */
    color: #50fa7b;            /* Green Text */
    border: 2px solid #50fa7b; /* Green Border */
    
    text-decoration: none;
    font-weight: bold;
    font-size: 16px;
    cursor: pointer;
    box-shadow: 3px 3px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0.5);
    transition: all 0.1s;
  }

  /* Hover Effect: Invert Colors */
  .pixel-btn:hover {
    background-color: #50fa7b;
    color: #282a36;
    transform: translateY(2px);
    box-shadow: 1px 1px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0.5);
  }
</style>
```
